attributes.action: Stop Banks from benefiting by way of bonuses of any kind, which have been created due to falsehood..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...e.g. the first letter my 18 year old son recieved was from a credit card co.,  ...I threw it in the bin!!  How did they expect a student, working on
Tesco fresh produce section once a week to cope with ANY kind of debt!!!   This is not only STUPID but a crime.....  No one has the right to more than they can afford and bankers should not be paid  according to how much they can 'give'
in sums which cannot be re-paid .....
If I hit you over the head and stole your wallet, I could be arrested but you can steal bits of my pension, peoples houses, economise on medical care....and award YOURSELVES a prize!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
